Package org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.transform.v2

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityBuilder<T extends Activity>
    Root interface for Activity builder subclasses
    Builder
    Root interface for builder hierarchy
    NodeBuilderFactory<T extends NodeBuilder,S extends Activity>
    Interface for all NodeBuilderFactory subclasses.
    ProcessBuilder<T>  
    ProcessContext<T>
    Type T represents the base object type for process nodes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBuilder
    Abstract implementation to handle some common functions used by Builder subclasses
    AbstractNodeBuilderFactory<T extends NodeBuilder,S extends Activity>  
    AbstractProcessBuilder<T>  
    AbstractProcessContext<T,T2>
    T = base class of all nodes for this notation system T2 = class for the target process being created
    ActivityBuilderFactory<T extends Activity>
    Factory class for obtaining an ActivityBuilderFactory instance based on the activity and type of notation (ProcessContext)
    ActivityBuilderFactoryFactory
    Holds references to all candidate ActivityBuilderFactories and selects the correct ActivityBuilderFactory to be used for specified conditions.
    ActivityBuilderImpl<T extends Activity>
    Abstract base implementation for ActivityBuilder subclasses
    BypassableActivityBuilder  
    BypassableActivityBuilderFactory  
    ComplexSetActivityBuilder  
    ComplexSetActivityBuilderFactory  
    DecisionActivityBuilder
    A Decision is implemented as a task with transitions to multiple Activities This requires multiple lastNode instances
    ExitActivityBuilder  
    ExitActivityBuilderFactory  
    GatewayDecisionActivityBuilder
    For BPMN2 we need to use gateway nodes on either side of the options
    GatewayDecisionActivityBuilderFactory  
    GatewayLoopActivityBuilder
    A Loop is implemented as an Activity followed by a Task in which a decision is made This requires multiple lastNode instances
    GatewayLoopActivityBuilderFactory  
    LinkSource  
    LoopActivityBuilder
    A Loop is implemented as an Activity followed by a Task in which a decision is made This requires multiple lastNode instances
    NodeBuilder<T,S,V extends Activity>
    Abstract class that deals with building process nodes based on an input Activity Concrete classes will be responsible for rendering the Activity in a specific BPMN notation scheme such as BPMN2.0 or JPDL Type T is the object type of the node Type S is the type required for use by the surrounding process.
    NodeBuilderFactoryFactory
    Singleton class used to obtain NodeBuilderFactory instances.
    ParallelSetActivityBuilder
    Builds a set of parallel activities.
    ParallelSetActivityBuilderFactory  
    ScriptActivityBuilder  
    ScriptActivityBuilderFactory  
    SequentialSetActivityBuilder  
    SequentialSetActivityBuilderFactory  
    ServiceTaskActivityBuilder  
    ServiceTaskActivityBuilderFactory  
    SignalActivityBuilder  
    SignalActivityBuilderFactory  
    SubProcessActivityBuilder  
    SubProcessActivityBuilderFactory  
    TaskActivityBuilder  
    TaskActivityBuilderFactory  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NodeType
    Logical node types independent of notation system
